meanings.definition: Relating to the physiological and pathological processes in the body.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the physiopathologic changes in the body helps doctors diagnose illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The physiopathologic mechanisms of disease progression are complex.
meanings.sent3: The physiopathologic dance between health and sickness is a delicate balance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile masked the physiopathologic turmoil within her.
meanings.sent5: The physiopathologic journey from wellness to illness is often gradual.

meanings.definition: Involving the study of the abnormal functioning of the body.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the physiopathologic causes of rare diseases.
meanings.sent2: The physiopathologic analysis revealed unexpected results.
meanings.sent3: The physiopathologic quirks of the body never fail to surprise.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a physiopathologic puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The physiopathologic mysteries of the human body continue to intrigue scientists.
